title: (3 in one) Mortal Kombat 1,2 &UMK 3 for PS2 (Arcade Versions) *w
description:
Mortal Kombat 1, 2 and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3, all arcade versions for PS2. Tested by me and working fine.

Format: ISO
Size after unrar: 1.6 GB
Credit to: focus2308

Open Archive with 7-zip (really small & useful app)


Password for Rar: focus2308

Burn with Nero Image burner or whatever imageburner you use, Nero works for me the best.

Also has in-game menus, but to change a game you must reset the machine.
